name: Star Forces open source language files
tagline: Star Forces web game language files
body:
### Welcome
Since game was updated to [Pre-Alpha 0.2](http://wiki.sforces.eu/index.php?title=Pre-Alpha_0.2) there are new feature - Multi-Language support for the game! This will improve user's experience by playing game in his native language! Also we are happy to announce ability to give you required files to translate this game to your language! All information about participating in this Multi-Language support will be pointed below.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Check out our [documentation](http://wiki.sforces.eu/index.php?title=Multi-Language_support) or contact @dehood and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
